eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A CHILD ABDUCTION EMERGENCY FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Louisiana; AT 10:34 PM ON NOV 22, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 03:34 AM NOV 23, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: The Louisiana State Police has activated the Louisiana AMBER Alert plan on behalf of the Pointe Coupee Parish Sheriff's Office for 3-month-old, A,'laya Jackson who has been abducted. A'Laya Jackson was last seen on Saturday, November 22, at 8494 Bayou Run Drive in New Roads, Louisiana when she was abducted from her father. Jackson was abducted at 3:18 p.m. by her mother's cousin, Carnasia Mims. Mims is a described as a black female whos is 5'4" tall and 137 pounds. She is believed to be traveling in  a blue 2012 4-door Toyota Yaris bearing Louisiana license plate 533HZE. Anyone with information as to the whereabouts of 3-month-old ALaya Jackson or Carnasia Mims should immediately contact the Pointe Coupee Parish Sheriffs Office at 225-694-3737
